holidays.title: Martyrs' Day
holidays.description: Light a candle and say a prayer as we honor the legacy of Mahatma Gandhi.

holidays.title: NASA's Day of Remembrance
holidays.description: Observe this day to remember the warriors who laid down their lives for space exploration.

holidays.title: National Draw A Dinosaur Day
holidays.description: Bring out your pencils, colors, and paintbrushes and step back into the Jurassic world.

holidays.title: National Escape Day
holidays.description: Get going or do nothing — whatever you feel helps you enjoy life in the moment.

holidays.title: National Inane Answering Message Day
holidays.description: This month, clear out your phonebook and call out those who waste your time.

holidays.title: National Maxwell Day
holidays.description: Did you know that the name Maxwell is linked to a physics formula? Now you know.

holidays.title: School Day of Non-violence and Peace
holidays.description: Come, let's motivate our future leaders to seek a path of non-violence and universal peace.

holidays.title: Yodel For Your Neighbors Day
holidays.description: Take a stroll through your neighborhood and yodel along with your neighbors!

holidays.title: Sonam Losar
holidays.description: Experience the exotic Tamang culture in Nepal on Sonam Lhosar.

holidays.title: Becky Lynch’s Birthday
holidays.description: The reigning Raw and SmackDown Women's champion is already a legend in the books.

holidays.title: Biggy Norris’s Birthday
holidays.description: Songwriting, singing, skateboarding, surfing, 690,000 followers…Is there anything he can’t do?

holidays.title: Christian Bale’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hollywood stars like him walk straight into our hearts from the red carpet.

holidays.title: Franklin D. Roosevelt’s Birthday
holidays.description: With over a decade in power, we sure can learn some things from this great man.

holidays.title: Kid Cudi’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was a loner who achieved overnight success thanks to a post on MySpace.

holidays.title: Kirk Frost’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ups and downs, everyone has them. Kirk Frost finally found peace after a convoluted life.

holidays.title: Phil Collins’s Birthday
holidays.description: The training he received from Barbara Speake helped sharpen his acting and singing skills.

holidays.title: Phil Lester’s Birthday
holidays.description: Phil Lester is the hero of a hidden community full of people wanting a voice.
